rules.name: blockIllegalUsername
rules.description: Verify username using online mode rules.

rules.name: botTabListNamePrefix
rules.description: Add a prefix to the Bot in the TabList, using & instead of § to format the text.

rules.name: botTabListNameSuffix
rules.description: Add a suffix to the Bot in the TabList, using & instead of § to format the text.

rules.name: cameraModeDisableSpectatePlayers
rules.description: Disables players in /c from spectating other players.

rules.name: commandFix
rules.description: Enables /fix command to fix chunk data.

rules.name: commandFreecam
rules.description: Enables /freecam command to toggle your camera mode.

rules.name: commandGC
rules.description: Enables /gc command to allow you to force gc with jvm.

rules.name: commandHere
rules.description: Enables /here command to allow you to share your location with other players.

rules.name: commandOperator
rules.description: Enables /operator command to allow you to change the player's permission level.

rules.name: disableIllegalChatCharacterCheck
rules.description: Allows you to use characters such as subsections in the game.

rules.name: disableParticlesPackets
rules.description: Disable particle packet sending to reduce bandwidth usage.

rules.name: dispenserCollectExperience
rules.description: Dispenser firing glass bottles at players will convert to experience bottles.

rules.name: endGatewayChunkLoader
rules.description: When the entity passes through the ender gateway, the target chunk will be loaded for 15 seconds like nether portal.
extras: all - Give the target chunk a load ticket when all entities through the ender gateway.
except_player - Give the target chunk a load ticket when all entities except the player through the ender gateway.
item_only - Give the target chunk a load ticket when the player entities except the player through the ender gateway.

rules.name: enderPlatform
rules.description: Is obsidian platform generated in the end.
extras: all - Generate ender platform when all entities are transferred to the_end dimension.。
none - Ender platform will not be generated anyway.
player - Ender platform is generated only when the player entity teleports to the_end dimension.

rules.name: freecamRestoreLocation
rules.description: Return to the starting position when you have finished spectating.

rules.name: hereGlowTime
rules.description: Time highlighted when using here command shared coordinates.

rules.name: illegalPistonActionFix
rules.description: Fix headless pistons to destroy blocks.

rules.name: noteBlockChunkLoader
rules.description: When the note block is activated, if the top is obsidian and the bottom is emerald ore, it gives the block a load ticket equivalent to the nether portal.

rules.name: opLevelBelowSelf
rules.description: Operators can only grant the same or lower permissions to other players than themselves.

rules.name: playerStats
rules.description: Control of player and bot statistics.
extras: bot - Only bots are allowed to gain stats.
both - Both bots and players are allowed to gain stats.
none - No one allowed to gain stats.
player - Only players are allowed to gain stats.

rules.name: shulkerBoxDupeFix
rules.description: Taking items from a shulker box while destroying it will result in item duplication.

rules.name: updateSuppressionCrashFix
rules.description: Fix updates suppression causing server crashes.

rules.name: voidDevouringBehavior
rules.description: The action that will occur when the player falls into the void.
extras: instant_death - Dies immediately when entering the void.
teleport_to_spawn - Teleport to the player's spawn point when entering the void, or to the world spawn point if it does not exist.

teleport_to_spawn_cost_totem - Teleport to the player's spawn point when entering the void, or to the world spawn point if it does not exist. This action consumes a totem, and if the player does not hold a totem they will receive void damage.

teleport_to_spawn_cost_totem_or_death - Teleport to the player's spawn point when entering the void, or to the world spawn point if it does not exist. This action consumes a totem, and if the player does not hold a totem they will die immediately.

rules.name: voidTradeFix
rules.description: Once the villager entity is unloaded, the trading interface will be closed.

rules.name: voxelMapWorldName
rules.description: Send VoxelMap world information packets to client.

rules.name: wetSpongeAbsorbLava
rules.description: Wet sponges will be able to absorb lava.

rules.name: wetSpongeAbsorbLavaLimit
rules.description: Maximum offset limit for wet sponge.

rules.name: wetSpongeAbsorbLavaRange
rules.description: Maximum lava sucking for wet sponge.

rules.name: xaeroMapWorldName
rules.description: Send XaeroMap world information packets to client.
